articles.description: Several celebrities are named in a lawsuit filed against Yugo Labs, the company behind NFT series Bored Ape Yacht Club, that alleges it engaged in a conspiracy to defraud potential investors
articles.content: Several celebrities are named in a class-action lawsuit filed against Yugo Labs, the company behind NFT series Bored Ape Yacht Club, that alleges the firm engaged in a conspiracy with the A-listers t… [+9964 chars]
